sentences.sContent: Say I have an online resource that I want you to symbolically pay for.
sentences.sContent_eng: Say I have an online resource that I want you to symbolically pay for.
sentences.sCn: 比如，我有一个在线资源，希望您能象征性地为其付出代价。

sentences.sContent: In order to have language, any language, you need to be able to think symbolically.
sentences.sContent_eng: In order to have language, any language, you need to be able to think symbolically.
sentences.sCn: 为了有语言，无论任何语言，你需要能够象征性地思想。

sentences.sContent: Thinking symbolically is the foundation of everything we do — we live in a symbolic world.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thinking symbolically is the foundation of everything we do — we live in a symbolic world.
sentences.sCn: 象征性思维是我们做一切的基础，我们生活在一个符号的世界里。

words.tran: 象征的；符号的；使用符号的
象征，象征主义；符号论；记号
象征；符号表现；象征作用
符号学，符号使用；象征学，象征的使用
象征主义者；符号学者；记号使用者
采用象征；使用符号；作为…的象征
